scenario_name.description: Name of the scenario: for example 11_vs_11_stochastic. Look inside scenarios/ dir of GoogleResearchFootball.

team_1.description: Number of players from the first team that agent controls.

team_2.description: Number of players that other agent controls. If set to 0 - the second agent will always have to return 0 as action.

render.description: If true - renders the game on the screen. This option will work on your local computer, but is not supported in colabs/notebooks.

save_video.description: If true, will record the video of the playthrough.

logdir.description: Directory to write the state dump and video information.

running_in_notebook.description: Set to true, if you're creating this environment inside Kaggle/Colab notebook.

reward.description: 1.0 for scored goal, -1.0 for lost goal (it is given only when the goal is scored, and changes back to 0 afterwards)

debug_info.description: Human readable information passed from the system.

minimap.description: 72x96x4 tensor. Channels: your team, opponent, ball, active_player

controlled_players.description: number of players that agent controls

action.description: A Button to press for each player that agent controls: 0-idle, 1-left, 2-top_left, etc.
